thread.title: Grammys 2017: Jennifer Lopez Wears Ralph & Russo Couture to the Red Carpet
thread.title_full: Grammys 2017: Jennifer Lopez Wears Ralph & Russo Couture to the Red Carpet

title: Grammys 2017: Jennifer Lopez Wears Ralph & Russo Couture to the Red Carpet
text: Jennifer Lopez Proves She’s Still the Ultimate Red Carpet Seductress February 13, 2017 3:14 AM by Janelle Okwodu Photo: Getty Images Jennifer Lopez ’s style is an American institution. By now, everyone knows about the star’s love of body bling, a great plunging neckline, and a thigh-high slit, but Lopez always finds new ways to keep her look fresh. At the 2017 Grammys, Lopez arrived in a candy pink creation from Ralph & Russo’s Spring 2017 couture collection that turned heads. With its cutesy color and swaths of tulle, the gown seemed girlish when presented on the runway, but on Lopez it was a bombshell showstopper that hugged her every curve. Worn with a handful of Repossi diamonds and a matching sequined clutch, her pastel moment was arresting. It’s been almost two decades since Lopez first electrified audiences—and inspired Google to launch an image-finding feature—with her revealing Versace gown at the Grammys in 2000. In the years since then, she’s developed a personal look so popular that it has spawned countless imitations, but she remains the master of red-carpet seduction. Countless people may hit search tonight to order their own Pepto pink keyhole dress, but no one will wear it quite like J.Lo.
